column.name: end_status
column.text: 流程是否结束1=已结束 0=未结束

column.name: create_dept_id
column.text: 填制人部门：一般从表单取值，如果没有取发起用户的主部门，主部门没有再取用户的普通部门第一个

column.name: business_status
column.text: 业务自定义的状态,如自定义审批通过、未通过、正常、异常等(内置的状态是1=审批中 2=审批通过 3=审批未通过)

select * from ext_run_instance where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( title like '%${key}%' or
definition_key like '%${key}%' or definition_name like '%${key}%' or
start_user_name like '%${key}%' or
business_key like '%${key}%' or business_status like '%${key}%' or business_status_desc like '%${key}%' or business_category like '%${key}%' or
app_code like '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if> <#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>

<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and process_definition_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionName??> and process_definition_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionName)}' </#if>
<#if query.startUserId??> and start_user_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserId)}' </#if> <#if query.startUserName??> and start_user_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.businessStatus??> and business_status = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessStatus)}' </#if> <#if query.businessStatusDesc??> and business_status_desc = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessStatusDesc)}' </#if> <#if query.businessCategory??> and business_category = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessCategory)}' </#if>

<#-- 查询运行中的流程实例 --> select distinct RES.ID_ id, RES.REV_ rev, RES.PROC_INST_ID_ instance_id, RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ process_definition_id,
RES.ACT_ID_ taskKey,
RES.IS_ACTIVE_ active, RES.IS_CONCURRENT_ concurrent, RES.SUSPENSION_STATE_ suspended,
P.NAME_ process_definition_name, P.KEY_ process_definition_key, P.VERSION_ version, P.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ DeploymentId , C.title, C.business_key , C.business_flow_no, C.end_status, C.create_dept_id ,
C.start_user_id , C.start_user_name, C.start_user_org_text, C.start_user_position_text,
C.business_status, C.business_status_desc, C.business_category,
C.app_code, C.sn, C.remark, C.gid, C.create_time, C.update_time
from ACT_RU_EXECUTION RES inner join ACT_RE_PROCDEF P on RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = P.ID_ left join ext_run_instance C on RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.instance_id where 1=1
<#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = '${key}' or C.title like '%${key}%' or
P.KEY_ like '%${key}%' or P.NAME_ like '%${key}%' or

<#if query.businessKey??> and C.business_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessKey)}' </#if> <#if query.title??> and C.title = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.title)}' </#if>
<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and P.KEY_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionName??> and P.NAME_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionName)}' </#if>
<#if query.businessFlowNo??> and C.business_flow_no = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessFlowNo)}' </#if> <#if query.startUserId??> and C.start_user_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserId)}' </#if> <#if query.startUserName??> and C.start_user_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.instanceIdList?? && (query.instanceIdList?size>0)> and instance_id in ( <#list query.instanceIdList as item> '${StringUtil.escapeSql(item)}' <#if item_has_next>,</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#if query.isActive??> and RES.IS_ACTIVE_ = <#if query.isActive> 1 <#else> 0 </#if> </#if>
<#if query.isConcurrent??> and RES.IS_CONCURRENT_ = <#if query.isConcurrent> 1 <#else> 0 </#if> </#if> </#if>
